##Solutions For Exercise 1
This exercise is all about the Decomposition of [Toffoli gate](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toffoli_gate "Toffoli gate") (ccx gate).This exercise is pretty easy if you know the decomposition of ccx gate.
[![The Toffoli gate can be constructed from single qubit gates and a minimum of six CNOTs.](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ef/Qcircuit_ToffolifromCNOT.svg/1920px-Qcircuit_ToffolifromCNOT.svg.png "The Toffoli gate can be constructed from single qubit gates and a minimum of six CNOTs.")](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toffoli_gate#/media/File:Qcircuit_ToffolifromCNOT.svghttp:// "The Toffoli gate can be constructed from single qubit gates and a minimum of six CNOTs.")

If you run this exact circuit then it will not work. As I have said earlier that this exercise is all about decomposition. So one have to decompose this circuit further. This might be easy if you know these transistions. 
![H gate](data:image/png;base64,)   ---> ![Decomposed ](data:image/png;base64, "Decomposed ")
![T gate](data:image/png;base64, "T gate")   --->     ![Decomposed](data:image/png;base64, "Decomposed")
![Tdg](data:image/png;base64, "Tdg")     --->  ![rz phi](data:image/png;base64, "rz phi")
I hope you are able to solve the problem now. If you still can't then I have alredy uploaded my answer.
